title: Infinite Games and permanent Revolution
body:
![Prepare to meet the Doom](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U-4UgdOSZ9riklGV1RuLI.jpeg?height=821&width=1461)

[Such picture of reality looks hopeless](https://mirror.xyz/radioevrazia.eth/FEm-ufDgAWgo0S7XSm2mi6QyKE_0QPIuWGMlXELIjZk). As far as there is no lawful place for human freedom here. The pole of oncologic decay/differentiation is spectral/ghostly pole. Differentiation of being/existence/reality makes itself felt as something ephemeral. As fault/defect inside machinery of Formative Power. But of cause, any system strives to correct/repairer faults/defects. Rate of differentiation leveling by regeneration speed. On the one hand.

But on the other hand, that is game without end. And that is reason for optimism. As far as neither less nor win in that game is impossible. As consider comrade D. the Capital is increasing itself permanently. And therefore political/economic formations will blossom with cancerous areas of ontological decay infinitely. Control, compulsion an Formative Power will put out itself of action again. As said D., it is the sole possible Permanent Revolution that we have.

But I think otherwise. I think that we can make an end of the game. Human political history is sequence of wars, revolutions and incidents of genocide. That is history of stru9ggle for control of resources and means of material productions. As Nietzsche wrote, that is the Eternal Return of One and the Same. Depreciation of one values always cause establishment of other values. Abolition of exploitation always cause new form of exploitation. Values of aristocratic lifestyle guarantees serfdom or slavery. Proletarian State guarantees persecution and exploitation of counter-revolutionary classes. And as a whole value of human life guarantees of exploitation of animal and other non-human objects.

Nietzsche an Heidegger declared that they reached bounds of nihilism when they discovered that question of values is question of conditions, which make possibility of exploitation. But they could not imagine conditions which make impossibility of exploitation. And they took history of European mankind for a history of Being itself. And they took history of European mankind for a history of being itself. And overlooked many interesting things.

But of course history of the plant is not history of mankind. Moreover history of mankind is not human history only. As far as all substantial transformations which happened/happens to mankind are result of human interactions with non-human objects. For example language as system of graphic symbols for the duration of human history acts in the role of such radical object. But how appeared first symbols? I think that it is result of psychedelic plant poisoning. After that embryonic cells of language began to grow and develop on the human substratum. And human substratum began to change. In this way so called human consciousness was formed. And so-called human culture as well. Human existence failed in matrix of language and symbols.
At all events every human being is element of many large compound objects. If not ones then the others. And I mean not only semantic systems of symbols but also economic political ecological and technological systems. As McLuhan wrote rational human subject of European philosophy (with free will and other attributes) was formed by book printing technology. Totalitarian states of 20th century were possible owing to broadcasting technology.

I think that within cancerous areas of techno capitalistic hyper health one day something with ripen. Something that will able to transform structure of all economic and political formations on this planet. New radical object that will route us out the ring road of the Eternal Return.

I see outline of such radical object in architecture of decentralized networks/ecosystems. As Marx wrote, communism is idea of unlimited/unbounded access to means of production, for all people. In order to realize this idea, means of production must be out of any human power, control and property. Political realization of Marxist egalitarianism was impossible in the time of Marx when technological conditions decayed centralization of all human relations and non-human connections. But we see that at present architecture of blockchain is able to put some production process out of the limits of any human power/control. Network infrastructure that in this way works outside the formative space of States and Corporations already exist. Cryptocurrency NFT. That is just beginning.

Institution of property with regard to men’s of production is necessary to economic exploitation. Exploitation and compulsion o=is necessary to Nietzsche’s estimation /valuation and Heidegger’s metaphysics (as production of delusions in the capacity of truths and as expense of nihilism). “羊羊羊，跳花墙，墙墙破，驴推磨，猪挑柴，狗弄火，小猫炕上捏饽饽”凌乐开心的哼着儿歌小跑在回家的路上，他要向娘亲讲讲他下山路上碰到的有趣的大哥哥还有左手上迎着风呼呼转着的风车，在落日的晚霞辉映下白色的风车格外的耀眼，仿佛也在咯吱咯吱的唱着歌。小脸通红的凌乐跑到家中，喘着大气的他却突然愣住了，一股血液涌上他的心头，眼前凌乱不堪的一幕让他惊呆了，家里的屏风被打碎，桌椅被肆意的破坏，凌乐的爹凌云被吊死在房梁之上，一袭长袍垂直于地面脖子上的勒痕清晰可见，在不远处凌云的娘匍匐在地上，半身蜷缩，后背上还插着一把短剑，时时还有鲜血溢出。如此这般场景一个十岁的孩子径直面对让他瞬间手足无措，突然他看见娘身体微微一动，急忙下意识的冲上前去，用瘦小的手臂环抱住娘，只见他娘颤抖的微声说道“儿啊，你莫要寻仇，斗不过他的，咳咳…”随即一口鲜血喷涌而出，凌云抱着他娘颤抖的喊着“娘，娘，娘！”，可是已无人回应，在空荡的房子中只有那带满血泪的余音在徘徊。

过了一夜，凌乐终于拔下了娘亲身上的那支短剑，只见剑柄上赫然刻着一个“伊”字，剑身闪着白光，他心想：此剑定是大仇人所带佩剑，锋利无比寒气煞人，我将它携于身边有朝一日必手刃仇人。凌乐将爹娘合葬在了一起，早已习惯山林生活的他找来一块木墩，用短剑做成了墓碑状，刻上了爹娘的名字。眼前这个孩子已被仇恨所包围，他的心里只有复仇，可茫茫江湖要寻一人谈何容易，何况仇人留下的线索少之又少，仅凭一个伊字又何从下手，况且即便这千万分之一的概率找到了又有何用？他没有一点武功，无疑就是白白送死罢了。想到这里，凌乐又痛哭了起来，他终究还只是个孩子啊！

又过了一夜，这一夜里凌乐翻来覆去，不再哭泣，突然想起来前天山上碰到的大哥哥。那天午后，凌乐偷偷跑到山上玩耍，偶然听到不远的山林中传来打斗声，凌乐的家居于山腰，他只记得从记忆伊始便长于这山林之中，平素除了爹娘从未见过别人，慢慢长大后开始与这山中树木为友花鸟为伴，如今突然听到人声大大的勾起了他的好奇，好奇心促使着这个孩子静静的走过去，趴在草丛旁边，瞥向前方，只见二人一身白衣手握长剑正在比试，手上之剑在二人手中宛若游龙，忽快忽慢，其中一人之剑白如月光，剑柄之上挂有玉佩，舞动起来周身更有一缕白色剑气，一刹那刀光剑影好不精彩，

二人招式相近，动作相似，你一提他一挡，他一劈那人又一拆，一时间难分伯仲。稍息一人道：“冷师兄，这流云剑乃师傅遗物，为本派掌门所有，你怎可将它据为己有？”那人答道指着手里的剑说：“竹师弟，实不相瞒师傅生前许诺，他老人家走后要把此剑赠与我，靠我将他流云剑法发扬光大，只是当人无人再旁无法作证，你莫听信师叔谗言，他不过是想弄走我当这掌门罢了”，凌乐听的入神，言语之中得知二人姓名，一人叫冷修一人叫竹唯，竹唯道:“冷师兄，你随我与师叔对质，倘若你言不虚，我定还你清白”“算了吧竹师弟，我已成帮派公敌，待我流云剑法大成我定到无名山上寻你，将事实告知于你，”冷修应。

说时迟那时快，只见此人话语间左手藏剑右手持掌攻上前来，竹唯则急忙应对，殊不知冷修右手为虚左手为实，一掌被剑气挡住后左手之剑轻轻一拨，便把竹唯手中之剑弹飞，顷刻之间胜负已分，冷修说：“竹师弟，师傅说过剑在人在，你输了，今日我饶你一命，这流云剑交于我保管，你且信我所言，日后多多保重”，说罢便消失的无影无踪。

title: Infinite Games and permanent Revolution
body:
![Prepare to meet the Doom](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U-4UgdOSZ9riklGV1RuLI.jpeg?height=821&width=1461)

[Such picture of reality looks hopeless](https://mirror.xyz/radioevrazia.eth/FEm-ufDgAWgo0S7XSm2mi6QyKE_0QPIuWGMlXELIjZk). As far as there is no lawful place for human freedom here. The pole of oncologic decay/differentiation is spectral/ghostly pole. Differentiation of being/existence/reality makes itself felt as something ephemeral. As fault/defect inside machinery of Formative Power. But of cause, any system strives to correct/repairer faults/defects. Rate of differentiation leveling by regeneration speed. On the one hand.

But on the other hand, that is game without end. And that is reason for optimism. As far as neither less nor win in that game is impossible. As consider comrade D. the Capital is increasing itself permanently. And therefore political/economic formations will blossom with cancerous areas of ontological decay infinitely. Control, compulsion an Formative Power will put out itself of action again. As said D., it is the sole possible Permanent Revolution that we have.

But I think otherwise. I think that we can make an end of the game. Human political history is sequence of wars, revolutions and incidents of genocide. That is history of stru9ggle for control of resources and means of material productions. As Nietzsche wrote, that is the Eternal Return of One and the Same. Depreciation of one values always cause establishment of other values. Abolition of exploitation always cause new form of exploitation. Values of aristocratic lifestyle guarantees serfdom or slavery. Proletarian State guarantees persecution and exploitation of counter-revolutionary classes. And as a whole value of human life guarantees of exploitation of animal and other non-human objects.

Nietzsche an Heidegger declared that they reached bounds of nihilism when they discovered that question of values is question of conditions, which make possibility of exploitation. But they could not imagine conditions which make impossibility of exploitation. And they took history of European mankind for a history of Being itself. And they took history of European mankind for a history of being itself. And overlooked many interesting things.

But of course history of the plant is not history of mankind. Moreover history of mankind is not human history only. As far as all substantial transformations which happened/happens to mankind are result of human interactions with non-human objects. For example language as system of graphic symbols for the duration of human history acts in the role of such radical object. But how appeared first symbols? I think that it is result of psychedelic plant poisoning. After that embryonic cells of language began to grow and develop on the human substratum. And human substratum began to change. In this way so called human consciousness was formed. And so-called human culture as well. Human existence failed in matrix of language and symbols.
At all events every human being is element of many large compound objects. If not ones then the others. And I mean not only semantic systems of symbols but also economic political ecological and technological systems. As McLuhan wrote rational human subject of European philosophy (with free will and other attributes) was formed by book printing technology. Totalitarian states of 20th century were possible owing to broadcasting technology.

I think that within cancerous areas of techno capitalistic hyper health one day something with ripen. Something that will able to transform structure of all economic and political formations on this planet. New radical object that will route us out the ring road of the Eternal Return.

I see outline of such radical object in architecture of decentralized networks/ecosystems. As Marx wrote, communism is idea of unlimited/unbounded access to means of production, for all people. In order to realize this idea, means of production must be out of any human power, control and property. Political realization of Marxist egalitarianism was impossible in the time of Marx when technological conditions decayed centralization of all human relations and non-human connections. But we see that at present architecture of blockchain is able to put some production process out of the limits of any human power/control. Network infrastructure that in this way works outside the formative space of States and Corporations already exist. Cryptocurrency NFT. That is just beginning.

Institution of property with regard to men’s of production is necessary to economic exploitation. Exploitation and compulsion o=is necessary to Nietzsche’s estimation /valuation and Heidegger’s metaphysics (as production of delusions in the capacity of truths and as expense of nihilism). Therefore we are able to leave the ring road of Eternal Return only by means of abolition/destruction of this institution.
But institution of property itself is none other than technological possibility of various restrictive practices in regard to human access to objects. In the first place that is product of complex network which include many human and non-human objects. Of complex network that permit to hold stolen goods. As far as any property is theft. In this way the question of property with regard to means of production must be solved by means of technology. By means of alternative network construction. Construction of decentralized infrastructure/ecosystem. The central figure in such systems will be smart contract. Not a human subject. And because of that such systems will be absolutely inclusive.

As is well known all egalitarian political projects of  social reorganization turned into one or other embodiment of so called conspiracy of equal people in terms of Badiou. In theory such political solutions always were grounded by means of discourse which accentuated disproportion between human population size of natural resources on the planet. The tragedy of the Commines and so forth.

At all events subjects of accomplished in history social/political revolutions preferred equality within the limits of sole isolated human population (community) to continuation of equalizing/leveling social/political process on scale of the whole world/mankind. They acted in accordance with scheme which was described by Nietzsche. With scheme of estimation as realization of Will to Power. Value of civic rights guarantees existence of persons without civic rights. Value of equal people’s community consists in the existence of persons outside the community. From idea of Worldwide Revolution to construction of socialism in the sole isolated country. History of revolutions is history of betrayals of egalitarian ideals. Instead of destruction of values itself revolutionaries established new values. But any new values is new inequality and new exploitation.
As think this means impossibility in regard to realization of extra egalitarian social project within the limits of political field. As far as such phenomena as political field and society itself are constructed by means of technological  networks and metric systems. But conception of unlimited inclusion (in accordance with idea of permanent increase of revolutionary class basis) already began to realize itself under the guise of construction of decentralized ecosystems. As far as including of these ecosystems is impossible to restrict at will of one or other quasi-human being.

> ## permanent revolution will be mint in permawed

[https://twitter.com/radioevrazia/status/1449338156558524417?s=20&t=EjvQ5sz7KWzX5Fjh69FpHA](https://twitter.com/radioevrazia/status/1449338156558524417?s=20&t=EjvQ5sz7KWzX5Fjh69FpHA)

 
 The infinite Game and the Eternal Return ends here. And the Permanent Revolution of Trotskism began. Professor of Oxford University Malcolm Bull well enough articulated thought about undercover complicity between extra egalitarian ideas and destruction of values in his work/book Anti-Nietzsche (2016). As wrote Bull extra egalitarian distribution of good must label/reduce/decrease/abolish/destroy common notions about values of these goods. In this way Bull postulated that unlimited inclusion will route mankind out the ring road of the eternal return on the way to desert which will destroy all human values. I share bull’s opinion partly. But there is one problem. This idea bears no relation to present-day construction of inclusive society by earns of culture and politics on the West. As far as this phenomenon turned into cancel culture and so on.

Please understand me rightly. I hate sexism. I hate xenophobia. But also I hate any repressive social practice. The eternal return of Nietzsche is the Eternal Return of repressive practices and hierarchy of values which serves for justification of these practices. As wrote Bull, there is no humanistic answer to Nietzsche’s philosophy of the Eternal Return/ the Will to Power. That is true. Moreover I think that any humanistic answers are delusional. As dark as human beings does not exist out of non-human folds which human behavior consciousness and culture. But I think that there is valid non-humanistic / non-human answer to the Eternal Return. That is smart contract and decentralized ecosystems (network). That is engineering of decay which subvert the basis of Formation Power, State Control and Economic Exploitation.  And it’s only just beginning.

title: The Age of cryptocurrencies Begins or finished?
body:
Thanks to the diligent active media on the web, there is no need to introduce what is Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies and their history, where almost anyone knows about them at any rate. The main question is what will happen in the future of the crypto market?

## Bitcoin, the rise and fall of an empire


Back in history, when Bitcoin was first introduced, there was a high guard against this currency! how could a penny be a digital one? should we buy it? where should we use it? and millions of more questions in folks' minds. The [fear and greed index](https://investopedia.com/terms/f/fear-and-greed-index.asp) was at extreme fear index and only one guy dare to buy and expense millions of Bitcoins for a PIZZA !!!  After all, Bitcoin has experienced an advent, the advent of cryptocurrency! followed by other altcoins, tokens, blockchains, exchange platforms, traders, and so forth. Although the price of Bitcoin and its fellows has been fluctuating for many years, this rally grabbed people's attention to invest and took a profit whether in short or long duration.

![Fear And Greed Index Source: lookintobitcoin.com](https://www.lookintobitcoin.com/charts/bitcoin-fear-and-greed-index/)

## Will Bitcoin Price fall in 2023?


The situation of the crypto market is not as bad as you think! In the fact, nothing has changed at all! same as old, history is just repeating itself. Nevertheless, we have to return to our memories, In Dec 2017, The price of bitcoin reached its all-time high \~$19,000, at every jump before reaching that level, people's tendency to buy increased significantly and supported the trend drastically. But as one of the consequences of the dramatic fall was the tongue that same people started to utter different things! "The era of Bitcoin has ended!", "Bitcoin at $2000 level now! and will never reach its all-time high again!", "Bitcoin is a totally scam project, don't waste your time and sell all you have!".
Dear readers, Do you REMEMBER? do you remember all of these sentences and many other words that came out of folks' mouths?
If you remember, so that's happening right now. same words, the same analysis, and the same behavior of traders.

## What are the reasons for the Bitcoin price plunge?


We may read an immense number of articles dissecting the reasons for an up and down the prices, but in the fact, there is always a reason behind these fluctuations, and as friendly advice DO NOT DIG IN! It does not matter why the price downed or upped after It really happened. Sometimes war, sometimes inflation, government rules and etc.

## What is the crypto market perspective?


We are talking about the future! who knows about that? Cryptocurrency and Blockchain technology are just like the Internet! No one could say The internet era has finished! On the contrary, The internet has been advancing since its invention and even created infrastructures for many other inventions. Hence, The future of Cryptocurrency is eloquent and obvious.

1）基础角色获得方式: 去 『🎭』pick-your-role 点击你想获得的角色

OG获取方式：在推特上发布Magnety相关推文，多与官推互动，DC保持活跃。

VIP获得方式:你是一个有影响力的人，帮助助团队或者早期支持者。

image.png

2）测试获得OG。

创建好资金池后分享到个人推特，将推特分享链接发至 『🐤』tweets ，团队看到后很快会给role 。

# 测试

1）打开<https://app.magnety.finance/>

2）点击货币化（Monetize），填写基金名称，这个随便取，基金符号，策略。

image.png

image.png

3）另开一个页面。

打开<https://testnet.app.alpharoad.fi/>

兑换一点ASTR，或者其他想添加的代币。

image.png

资产只是单币的话可以省去此步骤，如果要LP资产，则点击POOL（<https://testnet.app.alpharoad.fi/pool> ）， 添加 ETH/ASTR 流动性。

4） 返回 Magnety, Accessibility随意填写。其他也是自定义。

需要等较长时间，等页面出现Create my Fund。点击它，然后钱包签名。

image.png

5）显示成功后，

单击“LFG”按钮转到Vault页面(如果关闭了就在My Profile页面查看)，点击分享到推特，会发一个推文。

image.png

做完后，到Discord社区 『🐤』tweets 发送推文链接获得角色。

只需在 『🐤』tweets 中发送您的推文，然后在推文频道中（否则它将不起作用）使用命令 !tweet 以获得您的角色。如果两个条件都匹配，就能成为测试网贡献者。

Magnety测试测试的时候，如果没有成功，可以尝试用最简单的基金名称，或者甚至用默认的取名，可能提高成功率。另外审核方面，在中文区给角色很快。

title: The Age of cryptocurrencies Begins or finished?
body:
Thanks to the diligent active media on the web, there is no need to introduce what is Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies and their history, where almost anyone knows about them at any rate. The main question is what will happen in the future of the crypto market?

## Bitcoin, the rise and fall of an empire

Back in history, when Bitcoin was first introduced, there was a high guard against this currency! how could a penny be a digital one? should we buy it? where should we use it? and millions of more questions in folks' minds. The [fear and greed index](https://investopedia.com/terms/f/fear-and-greed-index.asp) was at extreme fear index and only one guy dare to buy and expense millions of Bitcoins for a PIZZA !!!  After all, Bitcoin has experienced an advent, the advent of cryptocurrency! followed by other altcoins, tokens, blockchains, exchange platforms, traders, and so forth. Although the price of Bitcoin and its fellows has been fluctuating for many years, this rally grabbed people's attention to invest and took a profit whether in short or long duration.

![Fear And Greed Index Source: lookintobitcoin.com](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/tpu1Ug0qqT-9j073wm8C8.PNG?height=752&width=1493)

## Will Bitcoin Price fall in 2023?

The situation of the crypto market is not as bad as you think! In the fact, nothing has changed at all! same as old, history is just repeating itself. Nevertheless, we have to return to our memories, In Dec 2017, The price of bitcoin reached its all-time high \~$19,000, at every jump before reaching that level, people's tendency to buy increased significantly and supported the trend drastically. But as one of the consequences of the dramatic fall was the tongue that same people started to utter different things! "The era of Bitcoin has ended!", "Bitcoin at $2000 level now! and will never reach its all-time high again!", "Bitcoin is a totally scam project, don't waste your time and sell all you have!".
Dear readers, Do you REMEMBER? do you remember all of these sentences and many other words that came out of folks' mouths?
If you remember, so that's happening right now. same words, the same analysis, and the same behavior of traders.

## What are the reasons for the Bitcoin price plunge?

We may read an immense number of articles dissecting the reasons for an up and down the prices, but in the fact, there is always a reason behind these fluctuations, and as friendly advice DO NOT DIG IN! It does not matter why the price downed or upped after It really happened. Sometimes war, sometimes inflation, government rules and etc.

## What is the crypto market perspective?

We are talking about the future! who knows about that? Cryptocurrency and Blockchain technology are just like the Internet! No one could say The internet era has finished! On the contrary, The internet has been advancing since its invention and even created infrastructures for many other inventions. Hence, The future of Cryptocurrency is eloquent and obvious.

title: 守护中国传统文化
body:
钱穆说太平天国成功了就没有中国历史了，他其实代表了一种清朝到民国一直存在的“本土派”人士，毫无疑问他们肯定是爱国的，但他们爱的是士大夫的中国。到现在我们其实也能看到一些这样的人，他们学的是传统中国的学科，对我们来说是比较“异域”的，无论是文言的文学，还是传统医药，还是传统的史学。从这个点来讲，我们是比较西化的人，对传统中国不够了解。

一分为二地看待本土派，我们也应该看到其优点。世界上现存的传统文化其实不多：古希腊文明、基督宗教、伊斯兰宗教、印度宗教、中国文化。是什么让世界文化有了多样性？除了地理等强因素外，我们也要肯定“本土派”的作用。他们的产生是现实的产物、历史的产物，我们要承认现实，要分析原因。中国文化能够坚挺存在，必然是这些人做对了什么。我们并不是要否定士大夫这样的上层阶级主导的文化，而是要将文化全民化，即“盗取火种”。

文化冲击下，对“本土”与“外来”的思考是一个避不开的问题。每天都有几门语言在消失，都有世界各地的传统文化在消亡。为了精神的自洽与愉悦，我们必须要回答：我们是什么？我们的信仰是什么？想象一个说着西语、信仰天主教的印第安人，他的现实世界和精神世界会是怎样？或者想象当你改换了语言和宗教，与其他人生活在一起，会是怎样的境遇？我想，这是很难愉悦的。一个人的文化背景很难改变，也许很多人根本无法融入别的文化。文化是多元的，没有哪种文化比另一种文化更好，人们只有在自己的文化中才是舒适的。

我们应当守卫自己的文化。印度被英国殖民过，但是从一个印度人的名字中我们也能看出他是个印度人。可我们却在给自己起英文名，只看名字会误以为是英国人或美国人。很多国家都在节日、正式场合穿自己的服装，而我们穿西装，好像西方人。我想提醒的是，一个美国华人，怎么去教堂，怎么讲英语，他都永远不会成为一个真正的美国人，别人看他只会觉得他沐猴而冠。我们是中国人，不单单因为长着一张中国人的脸，还因为我们信仰中国文化。这不仅是对自我认同的确定，而且是自尊自爱的表现。学别人，跟在别人后面，永远不会被别人尊重；与他们不一样，有自己的信仰，才和别人是平等的。

[https://changshiban.com/](https://changshiban.com/)

原文链接：<https://changshiban.com/protect-traditional-chinese-culture/>

title: atou 2022.07.02/03----读书有感
body:
《周期》中的金句：

投资人的错误主要有三种形式----歪曲的眼光看待当前的事实，选择性感知和带有偏见的解读。

投资高手的突出标志：优秀的理解风险能力、评估风险能力、应对风险能力。

深入理解情绪和情绪导致的过度行为，周期性偏离长期趋势线主要产生于人的过度行为以及最终走到极端之后出现的修正。

所谓周期，都是人类非理性情绪在市场的体现。当前的web3.0处于哪个周期？目前的理解是处于爆发期的前夜，这一波收缩对于区块链的影响是巨大的，目前ETH的总市值只有1000+YU，而目前看来，这1000+YU的ETH却承载了web3.0相当大的一部分。不论是merge、L2什么时候得以大成，目前暂时还看不到能够挑战ETH的公链。并且其他竞争对手很多都抱着打不过就和平相处的行为了。

究其根本，BTC代表了整个区块链的信仰，至于BTC的实际用途，暂时没有发现。我更多的把BTC看作成为区块链的黄金，是万链之锚。而ETH才是区块链的USD，所有的应用不管是Defi、Cefi、Gamefi、NFT等等，都绕不开ETH。接下来的POS对于ETH的价格肯定是利好，也许在不久的将来，可以看到超乎想象的ETH价格。

在市场全部恐慌的时候，理性的来判断ETH的价值，以合理的成本进场。接下来要做的就只是在自己擅长的领域来让手中的ETH裂变、增值。等到美国扛过了接下来的滞涨，再度开启放水的时候，就是该逐步减仓出场的时候了。

把前天在雀语上的复盘搬过来了，既然梭哈了web3.0，那就还是按照web3.0的方式来记录我的web3.0征程吧。

title: 灾后重建
body:
7月2日周六的裁员周报发出后，很快整个公众号（裁员之家）被封禁了。

文章也没说啥，提到了商汤股票割韭菜的事情。但我感觉商汤的PR是不会这么快就能搞定的。

又回想了一下，应该有张图涉及到了腾讯。所以涨了教训，和腾讯相关的负面消息，都不可以去涉及。

事情已然如此，申诉是一方面，但是不报太大的希望。

**接下来怎么搞，才是最关键的了。**

唯一值得庆幸的是，3个微信群都还在。大家又变回了种子用户。

**请微信群里的朋友们，接下来一段时间里，帮忙多转发文章了**。

自从上一次封号开始，公众号就在大力给微信群导流，但是转化率肯定不会非常高的。

有读者问，之前的文章还在么？

很可惜，文章都没有了。我也确实比较懒，一直没有做备份，时间也没那么多。

我其实最心疼还是昨晚刚码完的5400字，关于自动驾驶10年的文章。可以和智能座舱那边形成姐妹文。

重新写，需要时间了，这文章写了3个晚上。

Q3的文章计划，倒是可以照旧，但要往后推一点。

Q3的微信群分群，也可以进行，但也要推迟一段时间了。我先要把小号这块的事情都捋顺。

本来公众号用户增长的目标，现在完全崩塌，要重新开始了。去年12月到今天，7个月时间。

大家肯定担忧，**我别崩了。**

还好。其实上次14天的封群，对我影响比这次来的更大。目前我情绪很稳定，只是心疼那124篇原创文。

我最近在看区块链和Web3，号称数据永不磨灭。

现在还真有点心动，想进一步了解一下了。

最后，大家最关心的，**你还继续写不写？**

继续啊。为什么不呢？

3个群，1300多个朋友的支持。

我昨天还特地看了一下公众号的常读用户比例，**26%**，不低了。

就为了这些，也值得继续往下走。

**感恩各位的支持：裁员财源\~**

title: Payment Streaming - Finally, Payroll that is Employee Centered
body:
***If you LOVE this article, are you against sending a tip to Cryptojeter.eth? Follow me on Twitter [@CryptoJeter](https://twitter.com/CryptoJeter) and retweet this post! Feel free to shoot me a DM as I love meeting new folks!***

[https://twitter.com/CryptoJeter/status/1540448633023234048?s=20&t=XJdCyH3lsKLyTNVtAKmkhw](https://twitter.com/CryptoJeter/status/1540448633023234048?s=20&t=XJdCyH3lsKLyTNVtAKmkhw)

***Thank you for the support!***

\*\*\*Views are my own\*\*\*

In today’s age, many things are instant. If someone wants to watch a movie, they can go to Netflix and watch a movie in a matter of seconds. If someone wants to hear their favorite song, all they have to do is have an Apple Music account and they can stream all of the music they want. If someone wants to send money to their friend, they can use Cashapp, or use a multitude of apps to send crypto in a near instant fashion. With the ability to do a multitude of things instantly, why can’t people be paid their salary or wages in the manner that they chose? With blockchain technology, payment streaming is becoming possible.

Payment streaming allows employees to receive real-time wages. For example, if someone wants to be paid daily, they can receive the payment the same day after labor has been performed. Contrast that to today’s payment system. Employees have to work two weeks and then the following week, they are paid. Now, this system is what many employees in the United States are accustomed to so there hasn’t been any disruption. To go into further detail regarding how the system works, the employers owe the employees for their time. Theoretically, the employers are in debt to the employees but the debt carries no interest, is not mutual, and is one-sided in favor of the employers. \*\*
\*\*

Contrasting the traditional system to streaming payments, the latter is easier for entities sending payments as there only needs to be a series of set parameters embedded in a smart contract. To give context on how this could work, tokens can be sent from employers to employees on a continuous basis depending on the rate of payment flow. For example, if someone is to be paid 1000 dollars a month, they could receive payments of 1 dollar and 39 cents an hour or 23 cents per minute. This flexibility allows for people to be paid on their desired time horizon such as hourly, daily, or weekly.

Additionally, with the advent of crypto streaming, employers can pay their employees by paying them in the token of the receiver’s choice. Imagine if employers were able to invest in their employees by paying them in whatever tokens they please. Although, at the time of writing, the cryptocurrency industry has taken a massive hit, getting paid in certain crypto assets can be deemed as a way to encourage wealth building.

Another point about the benefits of payment streaming is the reduced reliability of financial institutions. Financial institutions charge many types of fees, exchange rates, commissions and other charges that inconvenience their account holders. Additionally, financial institutions can control when the received funds are available for an account holder’s use which is yet another inconvenience caused by the traditional financial system.

Inconveniences caused by not streaming payments pose real-world consequences for people. Many people suffer from not budgeting properly and sometimes “life happens”, which causes a need for instant availability of funds. Currently, people who are faced with a challenging system are forced to go into debt by using credit cards or by dealing with an undesirable situation. Imagine if someone had a car issue that prevented them from driving. If this person doesn’t have the necessary funds to get their car serviced, they will have to deal with the inconveniences of finding another means of traveling until they have access to more funds in the next pay period. However, if these individuals were able to stream their funds, they could pay to service their car once they accumulated enough money.

Currently, there are few projects looking to develop ways to drive the possibility of payment streaming. These projects include [Superfluid](https://twitter.com/superfluid_hq?s=21&t=TQ0hhKE3YVhqgYWodV8ytw), [Streamflow](https://twitter.com/streamflow_fi?s=21&t=TQ0hhKE3YVhqgYWodV8ytw), and [Roketo](https://twitter.com/roketostream?s=21&t=BmFd1mwTgP2PbnEkssusaw). While this article has focused on primarily payment streaming for wages, these vendors offer a wide variety of use cases leveraging the principles of streaming payments.

Superfluid is a startup founded in 2020 by [Francesco George Renzi](https://twitter.com/francescorenzia?s=21&t=dKh-A-ylpVemIi0IgKrrEQ), Miao Miao, and [Michele D’Aliessi](https://twitter.com/micheledaliessi?s=21&t=iUfVqmNKEWz9jvhFd6JadA). In July of 2021, the team scored an investment of 9 million dollars from firms including [Multicoin Capital](https://twitter.com/multicoincap?lang=en), [DeFinance Capital](https://twitter.com/defiancecapital?lang=en), [Delphi Ventures](https://twitter.com/delphi_digital?s=21&t=RlA3a4zRKneEclyUUyDPZQ), [Semantic Ventures](https://twitter.com/semanticvc). The round also included angel investors such as [Balaji Srinivasan](https://twitter.com/balajis?s=21&t=RlA3a4zRKneEclyUUyDPZQ), [Stani Kulechov](https://twitter.com/stanikulechov?s=21&t=RlA3a4zRKneEclyUUyDPZQ), [Ryan Selkis](https://twitter.com/twobitidiot), and [David Hoffman](https://twitter.com/trustlessstate?s=21&t=Tie5dI57iuQ7NR7Tl-z1Xg). The project has also received support from DAOs such as [Metacartel Ventures](https://twitter.com/venture_dao?s=21&t=bQzg6TxN1CjM5PYGMiFz3g), [The LAO](https://twitter.com/thelaoofficial), and [Alliance DAO](https://twitter.com/alliancedao?s=21&t=Bm0D9ECQAH4n1zJIz23Viw). Superfluid facilitates streams on the Ethereum blockchain through its smart contract framework that allows users to transfer tokens or other digital assets on chain with a set of predefined rules called agreements. Currently, the project’s capabilities include payment streaming with gas less transfers, with real-time liquidity which allows its users to only require enough balance to keep their payment streams open. Furthermore, users do not incur a delay when withdrawing their funds.

Streamflow is a startup founded in 2021 whose team includes [@imprfekt](https://twitter.com/imprfekt?s=21&t=HKaDWqeT71m1QOpdwiAzRA) and others. The platform is built on Solana and its current capabilities include streaming payments and token vesting with more options coming in the future such as a multisig wallet. In the future, Streamflow aims to expand cross-chain and onboard web2 projects onto the platform. Streamflow’s most recent round of funding was a 3.1 million dollar seed round with backers that include [Jump Crypto](https://mobile.twitter.com/jumpcryptohq), [Solana Ventures](https://twitter.com/solanaventures?lang=en), [GBV Capital](https://twitter.com/gbvofficial?lang=en), [AngelDAO](https://twitter.com/angeldaoorg), [Huobi Ventures](https://twitter.com/huobiventures?lang=en) and others.

Roketo is another payment streaming platform built on the [NEAR protocol](https://twitter.com/nearprotocol?s=21&t=fbOfQH-ItSYRNF5qCpw58A) whose primary contributors come from Kikimora Labs. The core team includes [Taras Dovgal](https://twitter.com/tarasdovgal?s=21&t=M1qUr1bj0nbhFOfasGFgOw), [Olga Isaeva](https://twitter.com/olyflow?s=21&t=uhmNY24CggKkW3dNGRZqwg), [Vasilisa Versus](https://twitter.com/dcversus?s=21&t=TtmvHOfggCCZbllIIAOFsA), and over 20 others. Roketo is backed by [MetaWeb Ventures](https://mobile.twitter.com/metawebvc), [A&T Capital](https://twitter.com/ant_capital?s=21&t=vVrsk_8dA4U-LLSX4Qn4tQ),[Cogitent Ventures](https://twitter.com/cogitentv?s=21&t=zC-QgTxzxYj9dwbA31ldLQ), and [Move Capital](https://twitter.com/movecap?s=21&t=bbOzlhC0d07uGAI3Jwpacw). The company’s current capabilities include payroll, vesting, and airdropping. Regarding payroll, Rocket serves its customers by providing a quick solution to setting up wages for employees with transparency and low cost. Roketo advertises its ability to the preceding functions while also ensuring its customers have total control over their crypto currency. With regards to vesting, Roketo’s vesting product aids founders with streaming tokens to their investors as well as their employees. Within Roketo’s product, users can set cliffs for token distribution and keep distribution consistent. Lastly, for Rocketo’s airdrop offering, Roketo touts itself as the most affordable and intuitive product on the market.

With the aforementioned startups and most likely others who are focused on creating products to help users stream funds, one can imagine that there are implications of the success of this innovation. Payment streaming will provide more flexibility and create more control for people to have over their finances. This control can provide a way for people to determine the financial outcomes and create a way to adapt to life’s financial challenges easier. As mentioned before, these circumstances could allow users to have access to funds which could limit their reliance on credit, ultimately reducing debt. There are a multitude of use cases that payment streaming can benefit such as “subscription” models such as rent. Streaming payments benefit both parties of transactions as the requesting entity can trust that they will receive the payment continuously as opposed to in one lump sum payment. Ultimately, as this technology is adopted, it will be exciting to see how payment streaming will create a more fair, convenient, and mutually beneficial financial system.

title: Investment DAOs - The Force of Disruption and Evolution of Venture Capital
body:
***Thank you for reading this piece. If you LOVE this article, you can send a tip to Cryptojeter.eth (my ETH address)! Follow me on Twitter [@CryptoJeter](https://twitter.com/CryptoJeter) and retweet this post! Feel free to shoot me a DM as I love meeting new folks!***

***Thank you for the support!***

\*\*\*Views are my own\*\*\*

The venture capital (VC) industry is filled with household names such as Andreessen Horowitz, Kholsa Ventures, Bessemer Venture Partners, and Sequoia Capital. According to Pitchbook, there were over 300 billion dollars invested in startups in 2021. This massive figure doubled the size of the amount of funding from the previous year which seems to be the trend over the past few years. Additionally, United States VC firms in 2021 raised over 128 billion dollars which signifies the growing appetite and maturity of the asset class. Although there has been a lot of momentum in venture, the space hasn’t undergone much disruption. For instance, only a limited number of people can manage venture funds. However, the creation of investment-focused decentralized autonomous organizations (DAO) allows more people to participate in the startup investment ecosystem.

Investment DAOs feature a collection of individuals who have aligned on an investment strategy to invest in things such as startups, NFTs, or other things that can yield returns. Unlike traditional VCs, the LPs are the members of the DAO which can consist of a handful of people to thousands of members. These members in the DAO many times have tokens or some sort of governance mechanism for group decision-making. Based on the level of ownership that members have in the DAO, members stand to earn carry from the investments the DAO makes. At some traditional funds, only the top leaders will receive the majority of carry from exits.

The concept of DAOs may be very nascent to the market, but it has gained adoption in its infancy. According to Forbes, over 8 billion dollars sit in DAO treasuries as of February 2022. Typically, investment DAOs will have a wallet address, which allows for the organizations to deploy capital into new assets in a very seamless manner. Having an easy way to deploy capital is essential as it allows the projects receiving the injection of capital to trust the DAOs investing in them. For example, BitDAO held over 300 million dollars in its treasury at the end of 2021. Today, according to BitDAO's website, the organization has allocated over 600 million dollars to labs and autonomous entities. Therefore organizations like BitDAO need to have reliable and secure tools.

Investment DAOs theses vary. However, they all have the objective of injecting capital things that will strengthen innovation in Web3. For example, organizations like [PleasrDao](https://twitter.com/pleasrdao?s=21&t=GPETIC9lM1_en_yYprNqBQ) specialize in buying NFTs that have strong cultural significance and will be adding to the pieces prior to sharing them with the community. We even have a DAO designed to build a community of golf enthusiasts and ultimately create the SOHO House of golf courses called [LinksDAO](https://twitter.com/linksdao?s=21&t=kkI6nrWLLOqfkxfUEz1M6Q). DAOs like [Metacartel Ventures](https://twitter.com/venture_dao?s=21&t=X9-zysWX5UKzmcFJcB_1ZQ), [Alliance DAO](https://twitter.com/alliancedao?s=21&t=bsdWmUpkKw0I8HHdDvCleA), and [The LAO](https://twitter.com/thelaoofficial?s=21&t=F--OGlFKWuFVGVovmLze0A) are examples of organizations that invest in web3 startups. Metacartel Ventures features a talented group of operators such as the CEO of [Aave](https://twitter.com/aaveaave?s=21&t=j2cYjNPqQE2qH6RcseLTPw), [Stani Kulechov](https://twitter.com/stanikulechov?s=21&t=k19KZUiZF4g49NZfn3sXEA), and the CEO of [Audius](https://twitter.com/audiusproject?s=21&t=zqFnZe3JNLduiW6tLZ_MqA), [Roneil Romberg](https://twitter.com/roneilr?s=21&t=3to7J_8HSWpadfeDP598ng), who focus on investing at the earliest stages of company life cycles. Alliance DAO is similar to [Y Combinator](https://twitter.com/ycombinator) except it is an accelerator designed specifically for web3 companies. It is led by core contributors [Imran Khan](https://twitter.com/lmrankhan?s=21&t=rtD4M-Blxmf3sR5Rrz_srw), [Qiao Wang](https://twitter.com/qwqiao?s=21&t=MvkOrvptw2wC24dooGCNmQ), and [Jacob Franek](https://twitter.com/panekkkk?s=21&t=gsrFAbuB_gAOemZ3wgL_Og). Along with these leaders, Alliance DAO accelerators feature mentors that guide the startups in Alliance’s accelerator program. These mentors include the likes of [Anatoly Yakovenko](https://twitter.com/aeyakovenko?s=21&t=5qPlWFAZ0kPA48bP51_N1A), founder and CEO of [Solana](https://twitter.com/solana?s=21&t=5qPlWFAZ0kPA48bP51_N1A), [Tushar Jain](https://twitter.com/tusharjain_?s=21&t=gFFKAUcYgi_Vb8UQQNKo1Q), Managing Director of [MultiCoin Capital](https://twitter.com/multicoincap?s=21&t=eieoJ7hGZmdUgPqVtC8KAw), and [Roham Gharegozlou](https://twitter.com/roham?s=21&t=eieoJ7hGZmdUgPqVtC8KAw), founder and CEO of [Dapper Labs](https://twitter.com/dapperlabs) ([read more about Dapper Labs](https://mirror.xyz/cryptojeter.eth/UIxhCgN-XzVkGnuZLMPaVYzrVf9WCJPcs6-1ziVIyTk)). With a strong group of mentors such as these, it makes sense that Alliance would draw the interest of founders who want their projects to reach the heights that projects like [dYdX](https://twitter.com/dydx?s=21&t=AcrW6tNyVcvwsuS8ua5nkw), [0x](https://twitter.com/0xproject?s=21&t=I13qIzunPxsQVbGIz6HrqA), and [Synthetix](https://twitter.com/synthetix_io?s=21&t=m2OBlLi8r9VLVII-gjrnqw) have reached. The LAO is an investment DAO that is focused on projects that are built on the Ethereum Blockchain with a portfolio that includes companies like [Curve](https://twitter.com/curvefinance?s=21&t=th9tPXT7iJvVfLA1Y5VlHA) and [Maple Finance](https://twitter.com/maplefinance?lang=en). It features some of the most prominent figures in Web3 as mentors such as [Ryan Selkis](https://twitter.com/twobitidiot), founder and CEO of [Messari](https://twitter.com/messaricrypto), [Amanda Cassatt](https://twitter.com/amandacassatt?lang=en), co-founder of [Serotonin](https://twitter.com/serotonin_hq?s=21&t=wQYOf00gkrsBmpl4OUux2A), and [Cooper Turley](https://twitter.com/cooopahtroopa?s=21&t=Hds2v5AWFwQrcATFfwMkBw), an active contributor to [Bankless](https://twitter.com/banklesshq?s=21&t=eET89WPisiXy9MTXrbn4lA).

One of the things that you’ll notice about DAOs is that there is a stronger emphasis on the community not only being successful but also propelling the success of web3 as a whole. I mention that because some of the people involved with the DAOs above are members of multiple DAO communities. Collaboration is more of a strength for people who are in these communities. Unlike a traditional business where there is much competition, some DAO interactions are mutually beneficial to improve “the whole”.  In a [The Daoist](https://twitter.com/thedaoist_?s=21&t=iivjFj8PNH36OsC1ZkghlA) article, [Stefen Deleveaux](https://twitter.com/stefdelev?s=21&t=pTe_vWekGGmZijg8xENNkw) and [Numa Oliveira](https://twitter.com/numagama?s=21&t=eG0BZlw_t2PlCI2Nk9sj7g) write, “Building and improving the tools and platforms for DAO communities to work together will have immense impact, and will produce powerful interactions that transcend industries and unite competitors. When these communities can easily and trustlessly collaborate, coordinate, and negotiate, they will no longer view project-specific problems as ones to be solved in isolation, but ones to be tackled together.” With this in mind, investment DAOs don’t have to limit their conviction to one company solving a particular problem. Instead investment DAOs can build conviction in problems that need to be solved.

There are a few tools that DAOs are using to run their operations. Discord is the primary mode of communication for these organizations which is where these organizations can vote on investment decisions amongst other things. Another tool that has been proven to be beneficial for investment DAOs is [Syndicate](https://twitter.com/syndicatedao?s=21&t=9pHLLsai8f52il1cDjynbQ) ([Read more about Syndicate](https://mirror.xyz/cryptojeter.eth/lOkvqNxaMOb9gqXZT0ubRp5GFOXC30usWkXxyNa4W7w)). Syndicate’s primary product currently is its investment clubs. The product has over 3000 DAOs launched on the platform including [Amit Mukherjee](https://twitter.com/amitmukherjee?s=21&t=TBjgA5bVND-rN12ZQVfLPQ)’s [ChainforestDAO](https://twitter.com/chainforestxyz?s=21&t=UBv_MvccMdhO1azScnHK3w), [Global Coin Research](https://twitter.com/globalcoinrsrch?s=21&t=ZKRVD-sVnLl1BM7wsADTkg), and other notable investors. With the ease of access to invest collectively due to tools like Syndicate, more projects should be able to pursue funding opportunities.

Venture capital is notoriously hard to raise as less than one percent of startups acquire venture dollars. Web3-focused venture funds are still nascent as the industry is not even 20 years old yet. Investment DAOs provide founders with another way to fund their projects outside of venture capital. As referenced earlier, many investment DAOs also provide founders with operational support from successful founders and operators. Furthermore, investment DAOs present the opportunity to have an instant community of customers. The DAO members will be invested in the project’s success due to their ownership of the projects they’ve funded. From another perspective, it is very hard for underrepresented founders to raise venture capital. According to Fortune, less than 2 percent of Black founders receive venture capital investment. Investment DAOs are in a position to improve access to capital due to their inherent global structure, communal nature, and lack of responsibility to LPs. Unfortunately, many traditional VCs rely on pattern matching to make investment decisions which leads to only a few types of founder profiles receiving funding. Investment DAOs have a great opportunity to change this and make the venture ecosystem equitable.

Investment DAOs are the future of capital allocation. These organizations are positioned to take a community approach to invest in new projects such as NFTs or startups, particularly in the growing web3 environment. For startups, in particular, investment DAOs will provide their portfolio projects with an instant, brand-loyal community of customers. Furthermore, startup teams will gravitate toward having investment DAOs as partners as they typically include experienced operators and founders from around the world who can help aid founders succeed on their startup journeys. While investment DAOs represent the future of high-growth investing, this strategy is very nascent and thus requires the tools for these organizations to thrive. Tools like Syndicate are making it easier for DAOs to function but more tools are required to run more efficiently. Lastly, venture capital is notoriously hard to raise. Investment DAOs provide startups and other projects another avenue for funding where a road show is not the only option. Particularly for underrepresented founders, investment DAO’s global and community-focused nature provides another opportunity for these founders to acquire capital for their businesses. All things considered, investment DAOs are viable competition for the traditional venture landscape as they have the potential to allocate capital more equitably, take a collaborative investment approach by investing in various companies solving similar problems, and provide loyal communities that help investments and the entire web3 ecosystem to scale.

Before I used Go I used more dynamic languages like Python and Ruby, where you can pass any value anywhere and change class definitions or functions at runtime, whenever you want. Go—and most other statically typed languages like C++, Rust—don't allow you to do this. One of the things that I believe strongly about computers and that drives the way I look at them is that they are completely human-made, they are a world unto themselves that we created. In the end, a CPU is just a pile of very smart sand. If you think about that and take it to its logical conclusion you will realize that a programming language might have an official set of features, but it also has another set of possible features that can be made to happen if you combine the features of the language in the right way.

* 
 Était-il responsable de ce monde* *? Dans une certaine mesure oui, il appartenait à l’appareil d’État, pourtant il n’aimait pas ce monde. Et Bruno, il le savait, se serait lui aussi senti mal à l’aise avec ces burgers de création, ces espaces zen où l’on pouvait se faire masser les cervicales le temps du trajet en écoutant des chants d’oiseaux, cet étrange étiquetage des bagages “pour raisons de sécurité”, enfin avec la tournure générale que les choses avaient prise, avec cette ambiance pseudo-ludique, mais en réalité d’une normativité quasi fasciste, qui avait peu à peu infecté les moindres recoins de la vie quotidienne.* 

`Is a translation meant for readers who do not understand the original? This would seem to explain adequately the divergence of their standing in the realm of art.`

Was he responsible for this world? To a certain extent yes, he belonged to the state apparatus, yet he did not like this world. And Bruno, he knew, would also have felt uncomfortable with these creative burgers, these zen spaces where you could have your neck massaged during the trip while listening to birdsong, this strange baggage labeling “for security reasons”, finally with the general turn that things had taken, with this pseudo-ludic atmosphere, but in reality of an almost fascist normativity, which had gradually infected the smallest corners of life daily.

Purely computer-generated writing, in which there is no apparent physical “act” of writing, poses a further problem for this schema. I argue that this kind of writing can be understood as a “complex assemblage of parts” like the Oracle of Delphi that *produces* automatic writing. The computer itself acts as the medium in this assemblage, called into service to produce oracular texts in ritual systems (like the *I Magma* app), designed and constructed by magicians—in this case, the artists and programmers responsible for the app.[\[13\]](https://www.serpentinegalleries.org/art-and-ideas/the-umbra-of-an-imago-writing-under-control-of-machine-learning/#reference-thirteen)

title: Fracton Protocol Academy——hiBAYC
body:
The first two chapters of Fracton Protocol Acadamy introduced the fundraising process through Blind Box and BAYC fractions (People’s BAYC), which can be considered 1/1000 of a BAYC. However, since the ERC-1155 token is still indivisible, the liquidity issue for Blind Box and People’s BAYC still exists despite their contribution toward making blue-chip NFTs accessible for everyone. The lack of liquidity increases the difficulty of asset valuation, reducing the effectiveness of price discoveries through the “invisible hands”. To solve this problem, Fracton has introduced hiBAYC, planning to launch hiBAYC trading pairs on Uniswap and other cooperative CEXs.

For ease of expression, we will use BAYC as our target NFT to be fractionalized. The following rules will apply to other NFT collections, such as CryptoPuns, Sandbox, and Otherdeed.

**What is hiBAYC？**

hiBAYC is the BAYC fraction token in the ERC-20 standard. During the fundraising period, users can swap their Blind Boxes for hiBAYC at 1:1000. They can also convert their People’s BAYC to hiBAYC at the same rate after opening the Blind Boxes. That is to say, every hiBAYC token represents 1 in a million shares of a BAYC in Fracton’s BAYC Vault.

**How to get hiBAYC？**

First, users can use the Meta-Swap function on Fracton’s official site to exchange their Blind Box or People’s BAYC for hiBAYC. In addition, taking into account the better liquidity, lower transaction costs, and smoother user experience of centralized exchanges compared to DEX, Fracton will also work with the top CEXs for certain fundraising rounds, with the CEXs acting as the agent to support the fundraising. Users can subscribe for hiBAYC on the centralized exchanges and trade on the hiBAYC trading pairs when launched.** 
 **

**Repurchase**

You might be concern about the inflation caused by failed fundraising round. In such a case, the ratio between the total supply of hiBAYC and the number of BAYCs in the Vault will no longer remain 1,000,000:1. hiBAYC will depreciate in value.

Fracton has also considered this matter and designed a repurchase system to tackle the hiBAYC inflation problem caused by any failed fundraising round. Fracton will use the ETH raised from the failed round to buy back the accrued hiBAYC, with the repurchase price being the total ETH raised/(the number of Blind Box minted \* 1000). Due to technical reasons, our v1 version cannot execute the repurchase automatically. The repurchase will be carried out by the core members of Fracton as a temporary solution. We will include a decentralized and automatic repurchase system in the upcoming v2 update.

**Transaction Fees**

For each on-chain transaction of hiBAYC, the contract will charge a 0.2% transaction fee. Due to limitations in the current development stage, our v1 version is unable to decentralize the use of the transaction fees. In the upcoming v2 version, the DAO governance proposal will utilize the transaction fees wisely. They will play a more critical role in the Fracton ecosystem, such as providing liquidity on Uniswap, rewarding early participants, or rewarding early fundraisers.

So far, we have covered the majority of the fundraising function of Fracton Protocol. Fracton created Blind Box and People’s BAYC - tokens in the ERC-1155 standard - to overcome the barriers to purchasing blue-chip NFTs for ordinary investors. To further tackle the issue of lack of liquidity and inefficient pricing, Fracton created hiBAYC - a token in the ERC-20 standard. Since we have introduced all the fractionalized elements in the Fracton system, in our next chapter, we will be explaining in detail Fracton’s multi-standard decentralized exchange pool - Meta-Swap. This is a crucial component of Fracton Protocol, stay tuned!

** 
 **

**Next Chapter—— Meta-Swap**

title: A Birdeye View Of Cypto Bridges
body:
## Preface

With the explosion of layer 1 chains post 2020 and the fast-paced demand for capital velocity across the chain by capital chasing incentives and opportunities, bridges are considered to be an essential utility.

A running inside joke is that centralised exchanges are the best bridges, which used to be somewhat true, but market demand for non-KYC solutions is thriving.

 
 Blockchains like Bitcoin network, Ethereum, Avalanche, Solana, while great at making consensus and all the things we love them for, they are very siloed networks. unaware of outside world data including that of other blockchains. 

Colloquially called the oracle problem, these siloed networks cannot talk to each other. send out messages and listen to them in a sufficiently trustless way. Bridging problem can be thought of this way too. 
 

## Some Data

Over [$12B](https://dune.com/eliasimos/Bridge-Away-(from-Ethereum)) in TVL across various bridges (ETH<->Chain) 

![TVL pulled from Dune analytics](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/X2CDtDoH_eCNTajycY7dz.PNG?height=402&width=1868)

A quick comparison on some attributes of popular bridges. 
 

![Attributes of popular bridges](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cnR0u56c54EdHee_0lgOf.PNG?height=284&width=766)

## A case for connext

[Connext](https://www.connext.network/) with its underlying network - Noncustodial Xdomain Transfer Protocol(**NXTP**), has among lowest in the industry fees. 
 One key feature is it deals with native assets across all chains, which reduces the extra step to swap an intermediate bridge token that incurs slippage and additional LP fees. 
 

### About NXTP..

 
 This is first post of a series exploring why Connext with its underlying tech NXTP can be the  leading cross chain protocol for bridging assets and the bigger opportunity of xApps, cross chain apps built on top of NXTP.

title: 10 Useful Academic IELTS Reading Resources
body:
[ 
 The IELTS exam](https://specialistlanguagecourses.com/what-is-ielts/) is perhaps the most widely taken international English language test. Over 2.5 million people sit the test every year from around the world. [IELTS](https://specialistlanguagecourses.com/the-ielts-academic-test-an-overview/) is recognised by universities, companies, professional bodies such as the GMC and NMC, immigration authorities, and government institutions all around the world as a measure of English language ability.

# The IELTS Reading paper

The reading paper of the Academic IELTS test is a tough one. You have to read 3 academic texts taken from journals, reports and articles and answer 40 questions on them in 1 hour. The texts are long – up to 2,000 words each. This means you have to develop the ability to understand the main points quickly, as well as the ability to find the answers to the questions without reading every single word.

# What you need to do…

1. **Develop your vocabulary**, especially of key IELTS topics such as work, education, social trends, mass media, travel and tourism, and the environment.
2. **Improve your understanding of complex English**, so you can quickly follow complicated ideas and arguments. You need to see how ideas are connected together – within sentences, between sentences, and between paragraphs.
3. **Practice answering IELTS style questions** so you get used to them – work on practice test papers, get tips from your teacher, or use the SLC resource library (if you’re taking a course with us)

# As part, of this it’s critical to READ!!

The best practice exercise to of all is to simply read. When you get used to reading articles from newspapers and magazines, you will have fewer problems with long articles in the test itself.

Practice reading quickly for understanding, then look for specific facts and figures of interest. Make notes as you go of new words and phrases.

As a starting point, we have compiled a list of 10 useful reading resources and websites which may help you practice your reading skills at home. They cover a very wide range of topics, so are very useful for the IELTS Test.

title: Succession Series-Premiere Recap: Roys on Deck
body:
*With season three of* [Succession](https://www.vulture.com/tv/succession/) *now in the books, Vulture is returning to where it all began with weekly recaps of season one. Rewatch along with us and check back every Sunday night for the next pair of episodes.*

“Are we ready to fuck or what?”

This is how Kendall Roy (Jeremy Strong) opens a meeting in “Celebration,” the first episode of *Succession*. Before he arrives at this meeting, we see him psyching himself up in the back seat of a chauffeured sedan, listening to the Beasties Boys’ “An Open Letter to NYC” as he punches at the passenger-side headrest like a speed bag. When he emerges from the car, he takes one drag from a cigarette before discarding it and strolling into the corporate headquarters of Waystar Royco, a family business of immense global reach. His confidence is conspicuous and weirdly contrived, as if he’s impressing some invisible cameras following him around — or, perhaps more accurately, trying to suppress the insecurity that burbles just below the surface.

Kendall can open a meeting with “Are we ready to fuck or what?” for two reasons: One, he’s the No. 1 son of the company’s CEO, Logan Roy (Brian Cox), and nobody will tell him “no.” Two, he imagines himself as a cool executive, not the crusty old head of a lumbering media firm, but a hip dude who can see the future and speak in the brash lingo of the younger, more desirable demographic. Today, he feels he’s going to need that language to speak to Lawrence (Rob Yang), the *actually* cool head of a *Vice*- or Buzzfeed-like digital entity called Vaulter, which has opened itself up to corporate backing. “I think Vaulter is the shizz,” says Kendall, unaware that time has elapsed on “shizz” as a popular slang term and, more damningly still, unaware of how cringeworthy a word like that would sound coming out of his mouth. After all, his chauffeur just called him “the man” downstairs.

Kendall is also a species of human that’s always been around but seized the spotlight during the Trump administration: the failson. Later, we’ll meet Logan’s other two failsons, Roman (Kieran Culkin) and Connor (Alan Ruck), and his faildaughter, Shiv (Sarah Snook), most of whom will be vying for the CEO spot at Waystar, but none of whom would be qualified for an entry-level position at any other firm. Lawrence knows this well, and he’s the only one in the room with the freedom to speak his mind, which he does so deliciously. He tells Kendall that he’s not going to let “you Neanderthals” raid the company, and he reminds him that he built an exciting new media brand from scratch while Kendall was etching track marks on his arms. It isn’t often that outsiders have the access to odious billionaires to tell them what they really think, and Lawrence takes advantage.

The lesson of “Celebration” is that it doesn’t matter: When you have that much money and power, anything is possible — at least, on matters where your soul isn’t at stake. Because the other lesson of “Celebration” is that money doesn’t buy happiness, especially in a family like the Roys, where the greed is corrosive and business rivalries poison every relationship. This is one reason why they are immediately so much fun to watch, especially in an immensely confident first episode where the show’s creator, Jesse Armstrong, gives them so many colorfully nasty things to say.

In the opening scene of the episode, the King Lear of this scenario, Logan, stumbles out of bed and, in a state of exhaustion and disorientation, urinates in the closet. It is a sign that the golden lion of Waystar may finally have to retire, and we meet his child-successors in short order after that: Kendall at his Vaulter meeting, desperate to secure any deal, no matter how terrible, to impress his dad; Roman, a shit-talker who failed in his executive tutelage under 30-year company veteran Frank (Peter Friedman) in L.A., but can still swoop in at any time; Shiv, who’s dabbling in political consulting while her fiancé Tom (Matthew Macfadyen) tries to ingratiate himself to his future father-in-law; and Connor, who is the firstborn but seemingly content in his life as a rich, eccentric layabout. Not exactly a sterling list of candidates.

Logan’s “surprise” birthday party also yields a potential wild card in the mix: Cousin Greg (Nicholas Braun), a lanky, amiable doofus who loses his latest job at Waystar after puking through the eyeholes of a mascot costume at one of the company’s amusement parks. At his mother’s encouragement, Greg cleans up and squeezes his way into the party, with the hope that his great-uncle Logan, a man estranged from Greg’s grandfather, will make a call and put him back on the management track. It doesn’t matter to Greg that Logan calls him “Cousin Craig” — he answers to both names.

The distance between the Roys and the lives of ordinary human beings becomes clearest in a family softball game that seems like something the Kennedys might have done on the compound — on a modest, helicopter-accessible field, with catering and a customized scoreboard. When the Vaulter deal takes Kendall out of the game, Roman summons a boy of clearly humble stock to pick up a bat and raises the stakes by offering him a million dollars if he hits a home run. The boy is tagged out at third base, and Roman, in a show of such flagrant monstrousness that even his father is embarrassed, rips the million-dollar check up in front of him. He gives the boy a piece as a joke: “Take this back to your life. It’s a quarter-million.”

What happens next is part of a subtle running theme of the episode. A company man quietly approaches the boy’s parents with a nondisclosure agreement and surely a money offering of some kind to keep Roman’s behavior from leaking to the press. He’s cleaning up after them. Earlier in the hour, director Adam McKay makes certain the viewers see a housekeeper scrubbing the spot on the rug where Logan urinated, and we suspect that Kendall’s violent temper tantrum in a bathroom will be part of the job later. The Roys always have someone cleaning up their messes. And they’ll never know who that person is.

title: Infinite Games and permanent Revolution
body:
![Prepare to meet the Doom](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U-4UgdOSZ9riklGV1RuLI.jpeg?height=821&width=1461)

[Such picture of reality looks hopeless](https://mirror.xyz/radioevrazia.eth/FEm-ufDgAWgo0S7XSm2mi6QyKE_0QPIuWGMlXELIjZk). As far as there is no lawful place for human freedom here. The pole of oncologic decay/differentiation is spectral/ghostly pole. Differentiation of being/existence/reality makes itself felt as something ephemeral. As fault/defect inside machinery of Formative Power. But of cause, any system strives to correct/repairer faults/defects. Rate of differentiation leveling by regeneration speed. On the one hand.

But on the other hand, that is game without end. And that is reason for optimism. As far as neither less nor win in that game is impossible. As consider comrade D. the Capital is increasing itself permanently. And therefore political/economic formations will blossom with cancerous areas of ontological decay infinitely. Control, compulsion an Formative Power will put out itself of action again. As said D., it is the sole possible Permanent Revolution that we have.

But I think otherwise. I think that we can make an end of the game. Human political history is sequence of wars, revolutions and incidents of genocide. That is history of stru9ggle for control of resources and means of material productions. As Nietzsche wrote, that is the Eternal Return of One and the Same. Depreciation of one values always cause establishment of other values. Abolition of exploitation always cause new form of exploitation. Values of aristocratic lifestyle guarantees serfdom or slavery. Proletarian State guarantees persecution and exploitation of counter-revolutionary classes. And as a whole value of human life guarantees of exploitation of animal and other non-human objects.

Nietzsche an Heidegger declared that they reached bounds of nihilism when they discovered that question of values is question of conditions, which make possibility of exploitation. But they could not imagine conditions which make impossibility of exploitation. And they took history of European mankind for a history of Being itself. And they took history of European mankind for a history of being itself. And overlooked many interesting things.

But of course history of the plant is not history of mankind. Moreover history of mankind is not human history only. As far as all substantial transformations which happened/happens to mankind are result of human interactions with non-human objects. For example language as system of graphic symbols for the duration of human history acts in the role of such radical object. But how appeared first symbols? I think that it is result of psychedelic plant poisoning. After that embryonic cells of language began to grow and develop on the human substratum. And human substratum began to change. In this way so called human consciousness was formed. And so-called human culture as well. Human existence failed in matrix of language and symbols.
At all events every human being is element of many large compound objects. If not ones then the others. And I mean not only semantic systems of symbols but also economic political ecological and technological systems. As McLuhan wrote rational human subject of European philosophy (with free will and other attributes) was formed by book printing technology. Totalitarian states of 20th century were possible owing to broadcasting technology.

I think that within cancerous areas of techno capitalistic hyper health one day something with ripen. Something that will able to transform structure of all economic and political formations on this planet. New radical object that will route us out the ring road of the Eternal Return.

I see outline of such radical object in architecture of decentralized networks/ecosystems. As Marx wrote, communism is idea of unlimited/unbounded access to means of production, for all people. In order to realize this idea, means of production must be out of any human power, control and property. Political realization of Marxist egalitarianism was impossible in the time of Marx when technological conditions decayed centralization of all human relations and non-human connections. But we see that at present architecture of blockchain is able to put some production process out of the limits of any human power/control. Network infrastructure that in this way works outside the formative space of States and Corporations already exist. Cryptocurrency NFT. That is just beginning.

Institution of property with regard to men’s of production is necessary to economic exploitation. Exploitation and compulsion o=is necessary to Nietzsche’s estimation /valuation and Heidegger’s metaphysics (as production of delusions in the capacity of truths and as expense of nihilism). Therefore we are able to leave the ring road of Eternal Return only by means of abolition/destruction of this institution.
But institution of property itself is none other than technological possibility of various restrictive practices in regard to human access to objects. In the first place that is product of complex network which include many human and non-human objects. Of complex network that permit to hold stolen goods. As far as any property is theft. In this way the question of property with regard to means of production must be solved by means of technology. By means of alternative network construction. Construction of decentralized infrastructure/ecosystem. The central figure in such systems will be smart contract. Not a human subject. And because of that such systems will be absolutely inclusive.

As is well known all egalitarian political projects of  social reorganization turned into one or other embodiment of so called conspiracy of equal people in terms of Badiou. In theory such political solutions always were grounded by means of discourse which accentuated disproportion between human population size of natural resources on the planet. The tragedy of the Commines and so forth.

At all events subjects of accomplished in history social/political revolutions preferred equality within the limits of sole isolated human population (community) to continuation of equalizing/leveling social/political process on scale of the whole world/mankind. They acted in accordance with scheme which was described by Nietzsche. With scheme of estimation as realization of Will to Power. Value of civic rights guarantees existence of persons without civic rights. Value of equal people’s community consists in the existence of persons outside the community. From idea of Worldwide Revolution to construction of socialism in the sole isolated country. History of revolutions is history of betrayals of egalitarian ideals. Instead of destruction of values itself revolutionaries established new values. But any new values is new inequality and new exploitation.
As think this means impossibility in regard to realization of extra egalitarian social project within the limits of political field. As far as such phenomena as political field and society itself are constructed by means of technological  networks and metric systems. But conception of unlimited inclusion (in accordance with idea of permanent increase of revolutionary class basis) already began to realize itself under the guise of construction of decentralized ecosystems. As far as including of these ecosystems is impossible to restrict at will of one or other quasi-human being.

 The infinite Game and the Eternal Return ends here. And the Permanent Revolution of Trotskism began. title: [项目动态]数据分析平台Flipside Crypto、NFT聚合交易平台Gem、L2扩展解决方案Immutable X
body:
# 1、Flipside Crypto推出 NFT 的 SDK「ShroomDK」

6 月 29 日，区块链数据分析公司 Flipside Crypto 宣布，推出一款基于 NFT 的 SDK「[ShroomDK](https://sdk.flipsidecrypto.xyz/shroomdk)」，可编程查询访问全面的区块链数据。

[ShroomDK](https://sdk.flipsidecrypto.xyz/shroomdk) NFT 允许开发人员以编程方式查询14个区块链的数据，包括以太坊、Arbitrum、Optimism 等 Layer2 网络、Avalanche、BNB Chain，以及对 Flipside L1 合作伙伴包括 Solana、NEAR、FLOW、Thorchain 和 Algorand 的多链访问。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/y3mm7i6ysChh-bpi1iWYd.png?height=158&width=1352)

**ShroomDK NFT 作为用户的 API 密钥，用于访问专有数据应用程序**。 用户的 SDK NFT 也可以通过“**Spore**”升级，这将解锁更多的能量提升和产品功能。 持有 SDK NFT 还可以让用户独家访问 Flipside Crypto Discord 中的封闭频道，这是一个充满活力的数据分析师和具有加密意识的 NFT 收集者社区。 每天都会免费提供随机数量的 NFT。铸币后，您的 API 密钥将被显示并可插入 SDK / API。 当一天的铸造用完时，可以从朋友那里获取邀请码或在 OpenSea购买。

Opensea 购买链接：<https://opensea.io/collection/flipside-shroomdk>

每个 API 密钥都受到 5 分钟速率限制以及每日聚合限制。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DTVubqZMBY4drI22zURkF.png?height=156&width=1368)

### 如果用户需要更高的限制怎么办？

速率限制将通过“Spore”升级，Flipside即将推出。“Spores”是单独的 NFT，可以铸造并附加到您的 ShroomDK NFT。

初始 Spore NFT 将允许您升级查询运行限制和查询执行速度（计算能力）等内容。Spore NFT将很快上线，预计很快就会发布第一批。

# 2、Gem新增 NFT Mint 监控功能

6 月 30 日，NFT 交易聚合器 Gem 宣布新增 NFT 实时铸造监控功能，关注NFT 一级市场。用户可在 Gem 页面实时监控 NFT 项目的铸造趋势，并可一键参与铸造。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Fs46FfvDS-REa0SlplFOI.png?height=670&width=1400)

# 3、Immutable X 6月进展及质押情况分析

* 6 月起，Immutable X **激活协议费用**，即将对所有交易收取 2% 的费用，该费用的一部分将分配给 Immutable，一部分分配给 IMX 质押奖励池。
* 6 月 2 日，以太坊 NFT 二层扩容方案 Immutable **X 宣布**开源核心 SDK。Immutable  X 表示，该 SDK 拥有更好的性能、可扩展性和可读性，方便开发者在 Immutable X 上开发。
* 6 月 2 日，Immutable X **开启为期 6 周的 NFT 交易奖励活动**，会统计用户在 Immutable X 订单簿中的 NFT 交易，之后根据用户交易量按比例分配奖励池，总奖励共计 160 万枚 IMX 代币。奖励的 1/3 将立即发放，剩余 2/3 会在 6 个月内解锁。该活动将于7月16日截止。
* 6 月 16 日，以太坊 NFT 二层扩容方案 Immutable X 宣布推出 ERC-721 格式 NFT 跨链协议 Arch v1.0 版本，旨在**支持以太坊主网和 StarkNet 之间 NFT 的跨链转移**。目前该协议已上线 Goerli 测试网。
* 6 月17日，Immutable 宣布**推出 5 亿美元风投基金以促进 Web3 游戏采用**，这笔资金将用于资助在其 L2 扩容平台 Immutable X 上构建 Web3 游戏和 NFT 的公司。
* 7 月1日，Immutable X 启动 IMX 质押。在此之前用户需将 IMX 代币转移到 Immutable X Layer 2 钱包中。

## Staking 活动即将开启

Immutable X 的质押活动从7月1日开始，将分阶段进行。质押的第一阶段将在时间结束时自动奖励活跃的 IMX 用户，然后在第二阶段会切换到一个带有交互式仪表板的自托管质押过程。第一阶段质押奖励的条件是，用户的 Immutable X L2 钱包需要在整个时间段内至少持有 10 枚 IMX 代币，在质押周期内交易至少一个 NFT。第一个质押阶段为 7 月 1 日至 7 月 30 日。

用户需将 IMX 代币转移到 Immutable X Layer 2 钱包中。奖励将在活动时间结束时分配给符合条件的 Immutable X L2 钱包。

用户的奖励将基于用户在整个时间段内最低持有的 IMX 代币所占该周期所有合格钱包持有代币的比例。

每个阶段 Staking 奖励将基于收取的一部分协议费用（协议费用捕获价值的 20% 分配给“质押奖励池”）。 第一个阶段将包括自协议费用启动以来已收集的奖励。

质押的第二阶段将需要与专用仪表板进行积极互动。 这将在今年9 月份推出。

从上面可以看出，该活动对于已经拥有IMX的大户来说，可获得不错的收益，因为活动奖励是根据持有份额占比来分配的；而没有IMX的用户想要参与该活动，只能从二级市场购买。

**持有各份额 IMX 地址数：**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2PNhrUcZLeVG2Wj8H7ZmU.png?height=998&width=1060)

**IMX代币的流通量及释放情况如下：**

**Immutable X (IMX)**

目前价格：$0.911

流通量：235,284,001

总供应量：2,000,000,000

目前市值：$214,197,711

全流通市值：$1,820,758,824

初始发行量为 2000 万，2021 年 11 月按照 1:100 进行了拆分，后总量变成为 20 亿。

**代币分配占比图：**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bsYlzUydhuJ31-RBJ-RJf.png?height=742&width=1398)

**解锁时间表（从2021年11月开始）**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/oGDMSGAUnHw99Shgd0gJR.png?height=734&width=1324)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IrNNSKpGyuEdGqsnuYKK6.png?height=514&width=1364)

目前$IMX 流通量占比约 11%， 从上面可以看出，代币解锁基本呈线性，$IMX于2021年11月5日在Huobi IEO，IEO价格为$0.16，Coinlist的公募从21年11月开始解锁， Coinlist的认购选项一（2%份额）于2022年4月解锁完毕，选项二（3%份额）于2022年1月解锁完毕，Additional community growth (private sale)社区轮私募（0.4%）于2022年4月解锁完毕，目前公募和部分私募已经解锁完，在 2022 年11月剩余的私募部分（13.86%）会开始线性解锁，另外项目开发部分也会开始解锁，届时抛压会较大。

从IMX的流通释放情况来看，阶段1和阶段2 的质押活动时间处于代币解锁真空期（除开未公开的私募解锁情况）。

在6 月 2 日，Immutable X 开启了为期 6 周的 NFT 交易奖励活动，总奖励共计 160 万枚 IMX 代币。该活动将于7月16日截止。其中53.3万枚会于7月17日前释放完毕，目前总计48.5万美金，另外106.6万枚会于之后6个月内解锁。

总的来说，**阶段1和阶段2 的市场抛压较小。**

### Immutable X协议收入

第一个阶段将包括自协议费用启动以来已收集的奖励，Immutable X的协议费用是自6月开始收取的。

根据[cryptoslam](https://cryptoslam.io/immutablex)的数据，6月 Immutable X的交易额为800万美元左右，假如7月的交易额同样按照800万美元计算，交易手续费按照2%收取，7月活动结束前，协议总收入 1600\*2%=32 万美金，如果按照 20% 分配给“质押奖励池”，那么奖励池将总计收入6.4 万美金，按照现价，合计分配7万枚IMX。**从这个数据来看，Staking奖励力度没有交易挖矿的力度大，不过也可能该活动会有其他补贴。**

从下面Cryptoslam的截图可以看出，自Immutable X 在6月推出交易挖矿之后，买卖用户数变化并不大，但是平均交易额增长了接近5倍，而对应的总交易额也是增长了接近5倍左右。

title: Bank for International Settlements to allow banks to keep 1% of reserves in Bitcoin
body:
Despite its skeptical approach to digital currencies, exacerbated by the recent [cryptocurrency market](https://finbold.com/category/cryptocurrency-news/) crash, it looks like the Bank for International Settlements (BIS) intends to extend its hand to the new asset class by allowing banks to hold up to 1% of reserves in cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin ([BTC](https://finbold.com/topic/bitcoin/)).

Indeed, BIS’s Basel Committee on Banking Supervision (BCBS) has made the proposal for limiting the banks’ total exposures to “Group 2 cryptossets to 1% of Tier 1 capital” in its consultative document titled “[Second consultation on the prudential treatment of cryptoassets](https://www.bis.org/bcbs/publ/d533.pdf),” published on June 30.

## Group 1 vs. Group 2 assets

Specifically, Group 2 refers to the assets that do not meet classification conditions and includes specific tokenized traditional assets and stablecoins, as well as unbacked crypto assets. As opposed to Group 2, Group 1 includes tokenized traditional assets and stablecoins that meet classification conditions.

*Group 1 vs. Group 2 assets. Source: Bank of International Settlements*

According to the document:

> “Banks’ exposures to Group 2 cryptoassets will be subject to an exposure limit. Banks must apply the exposure limit to their aggregate exposures to Group 2 cryptoassets, including both direct holdings (cash and derivatives) and indirect holding (ie those via investment funds, ETF/ETN, special purpose vehicles).”

title: The 3-Step Method for Discovering Truth About The Universe and Ourselves, Applied to Personal Wealth Management and Investing
body:
It is called the Trivium Method. It was used and taught by the ancient Greeks, but probably discovered much earlier. 

You probably use it in your daily life, but have never explicitly defined it or heard somebody else define it.

The three steps are \[Input → Processing → Output\]. Also called \[Grammar → Logic → Rhetoric\] or \[Knowledge → Understanding → Wisdom\]. These are just different ways of labeling the same process.

Essentially, these are the steps a conscious entity has to go through in order to answer any question about the objective world and to create a more accurate picture of reality. 

1 → The first step entails the gathering of raw data.

2 → The second step involves the analysis of the data. Active Thinking. Weeding out falsehoods by discovering contradictions.

3 → The third step involves applying the results from the second step to the real world.

For a better result, the method has to be reapplied to the new data generated by the third step.

\[1 → 2 → 3\] **→** \[1 → 2 → 3\] **→** \[1 → 2 → 3\] **→** \[1 → 2 → 3\] **→** \[1 → 2 → 3\] **→** …

The Quality of the discovered Truth will depend on how many times you applied the method to a specific question. 

Ok, that’s the Method. Now let’s apply it to personal wealth management and investing. 

1. Gather Information. Here we want to be as broad and inclusive as possible and use a diverse set of sources. Here are some important topics to consider:
   1. World Politics 
   2. Stock Market
   3. Crypto Market 
      1. Coins
      2. DApps and Protocols
   4. NFT Market 
   5. Tech/Scientific Advancements/Discoveries
   6. Big Industries
   7. Country Economics
2. Analyze the data and create a Spreadsheet of your financial portfolio. You could have different charts for different markets, but ideally, it’s all in one place, easy to retrieve and update. You should update your portfolio regularly. Your portfolio might have different asset categories, like 
   1. Cryptocurrencies
   2. Stocks
   3. Fiat Currencies
   4. NFTs
   5. LP Tokens
3. Execute trades. After crystallizing your thoughts into a concrete portfolio spreadsheet, it is time to trade assets and execute smart contracts in order to put your money where your mouth is. You might need to
   1. Trade
   2. Buy
   3. Hold
   4. Invest
   5. Lend
   6. Borrow
   7. Provide Liquidity
